Reviews.Title: Very good Resolution, easy to install and manage
Reviews.Author: Eddy Castillo
Reviews.Content: I'm satisfied with the system, I installed in less than a half day and everything its working as I was expecting, very happy with the purchase, good Price, nice images and perfect software. I suggest to locate a fan at the top cover of the Dvr in order to avoid overheating the system and prevent burn, this is not only with this Brand but with most of DVR if its going to be installed in a non AC environment such as the one I installed it.
